elementValueMap.apiname:
=IF(
    %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% == "Otros beneficiarios" && ISBLANK(%data:otherBeneficiaries%),
    "otherBeneficiaries",
    IF(
        ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%),
        "beneficiaryType",
        IF(
            ISNOTBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%) && (%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% !="Otros beneficiarios" && %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% !="Herederos legales"),
            "beneficiaryType",
            $Vlocity.null
        )
    )
)

PropertySetConfig.executionConditionalFormula:
((%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% == "Otros beneficiarios" && ISBLANK(%data:otherBeneficiaries%)) || ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%) || (
            ISNOTBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%) && (%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% !="Otros beneficiarios" && %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% !="Herederos legales"))) && (%GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "902" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "901" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "204" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "155" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "157" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "168" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "913" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "914" OR %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode%  == "951") && (ISBLANK(%filterErrorList%) || (ISNOTBLANK(%filterErrorList%) && %filterErrorList:code% == null && %filterErrorList:message%  == null))
PropertySetConfig.label: SetValues19
